Dear {{text:field_1762028297483}},

We have evaluated your application and qualifications for the position of [b]Deputy Sheriff Trainee[/b] and regret to inform you that you were not selected for this position due to issues that may have involved:

[list][*]Employment history;
[*]Credit or financial history;
[*]Discovered undisclosed information;
[*]Dishonesty;
[*]Incomplete application;
[*]Other reason(s) as not listed.
[*][ooc]{{textarea:field_1762028322518}}[/ooc][/list][br][/br]
Under all circumstances, you are ineligible to reapply during the current recruitment drive as well as any concurrent recruitment drives for civilian employment. You may reapply [b]three (3)[/b] weeks from the date of your denial if 'open continuous' is ongoing.

[b]Any formal appeal must be in writing and received by Training Bureau Command within ten (10) business days from the [u]postmark date[/u] of this letter. Please note, appeals may take 5-7 business days to be processed.

To appeal, you must demonstrate that the factors leading to your disqualification are in error.[/b]

Sincerely,
